name: AlphaMaskInstruction
description: class AlphaMaskEffect extends FilterEffect implements PoolItem { constructor() { super(); this.filters = [new MaskFilter({ sprite: new Sprite(Texture.EMPTY), inverse: false, resolution: 'inherit', antialias: 'inherit' })]; } get sprite(): Sprite { return (this.filters[0] as MaskFilter).sprite; } set sprite(value: Sprite) { (this.filters[0] as MaskFilter).sprite = value; } get inverse(): boolean { return (this.filters[0] as MaskFilter).inverse; } set inverse(value: boolean) { (this.filters[0] as MaskFilter).inverse = value; } public init: () => void; } /** @internal
